loc2.description: The symbol above the doorway glows. Make a Luck (-1) check. If you pass gain 2 Stamina and 2 Sanity. If you fail, discard 2 items of your choice.
loc2.name: Celeano

loc1.description: At the south gates of Thran, you are stopped by a red-robed sentry until you can tell three dreams beyond belief. Pass a Luck (-1) check to tour the golden spires of Threan, gaining 2 clue tokens in the process. If you failm stay here next turn.
loc1.name: The Dreamlands

other.description: Pass a Fight (-2) check to lever back the lid of the stone chest. Inside, you find $8. If you fail, lose 1 Stamina.
